summary: This is an email chain regarding deconfliction and information sharing between law enforcement agencies concerning an investigation into ASSOCIATION POUR LA PROMOTION DE LA POLITIQUE CULTURELLE and GRATITUDE AMERICA LTD. The email indicates no objection to the request and thanks the sender for reaching out.

persons.name: Special Agent FBI New York Field Office Violent Crimes Task Force
persons.context: The sender of the email who states they have no objection to a deconfliction request and thanks the recipient for reaching out.

events.title: Deconfliction Request Email
events.description: An email is sent regarding a deconfliction request related to an investigation into ASSOCIATION POUR LA PROMOTION DE LA POLITIQUE CULTURELLE and GRATITUDE AMERICA LTD.
personsInvolved: Special Agent FBI New York Field Office Violent Crimes Task Force

keyFacts: The document is an email dated March 6, 2020, concerning a deconfliction request.
The subject involves entities named 'ASSOCIATION POUR LA PROMOTION DE LA POLITIQUE CULTURELLE' and 'GRATITUDE AMERICA LTD'.
The email originates from an FBI Special Agent in the New York Field Office's Violent Crimes Task Force.
The agent states they have no objection to the request, indicating inter-agency coordination.
The context suggests an ongoing financial or investigative matter involving entities potentially linked to the Epstein case.
